channel.title: Soundarya Dundi on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Soundarya Dundi on My New Hugo Site

item.title: about
item.description: Soundarya Dundi I am a climate change and development researcher. I am currenty studying Master in Applied International Development from the University of Reading, UK. Prior to this I led a community movement to save the Arpa River in Bilaspur, victim of illicit dumping by local industries and hospitals. I have also worked with students from displaced and vulnerable communities through my work with government schools and children’s ministry. I have got a gold medal in Rural Technology and French from Central University of Chhattisgarh.
